title: Ratio Imaging Analyzer (RIA): A Standalone, Zero-Dependency Tool for Robust Ratiometric Fluorescence Analysis
description:
Ratio Imaging Analyzer (RIA) is a lightweight, open-source desktop application designed to streamline the processing of ratiometric fluorescence imaging data. Unlike complex image processing libraries that require scripting skills, RIA bridges the gap between raw data and biological insight through a user-friendly Graphical User Interface (GUI).

Statement of Need:

Quantitative analysis of time-lapse data remains a bottleneck for "wet-lab" experimental biologists. RIA addresses this challenge by offering an "all-in-one" standalone executable that runs on standard personal computers without requiring Python environment configuration.
